decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - This development must be completed before 30 May 2019.

You must notify the Council that you have completed the work no later than 21 days after doing so, giving the name of the developer, the address of the property where the extension is and the date of completion.

The materials used on the external surfaces of the development shall match those used in the building to which it is attached in terms of style, colour, texture and, in the case of brickwork, bonding, coursing and pointing.

Condition : 2 - You must notify the Council that you have completed the work no later than 21 days after doing so, giving the name of the developer, the address of the property where the extension is and the date of completion

Condition : 3 - The materials used on the external surfaces of the development shall match those used in the building to which it is attached in terms of style, colour, texture and, in the case of brickwork, bonding, coursing and pointing.
description: Ground floor rear extension 6 metres deep, 3 metres high to eaves with a maximum height of 3.4 metres
